skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Furutaka.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Furutaka-class heavy... Err, just call me Furutaka! I may not look it, but I participated in the First Battle of the Solomon Sea! I also helped my sister Aoba out a lot! In the end though, I rushed too far ahead and didn't make it back myself... Ehehe...
skins.acquisition: Ah! Sorry for bumping into you... Huh? You're the Commander?! F-Furutaka, first ship of the Furutaka class, reporting for duty! Can you please forget what just happened? Ehehe...
skins.login: Commander, please be more careful when you open the door...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, Kako doesn't really hate you, so don't take it too personally.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Um... because I'm not very smart, maybe Kako should take my place at meetings instead...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ouch...! Ahh, I'm fine... I just nodded off and bumped my head.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I never thought you'd take an interest in me, Commander... Frankly, I'm a bit happy~

skins.shipDescription: What's wrong, Commander? Why are you staring at me like that? My body? Yes, some things seem to have gotten bigger... Want to take a look?
skins.acquisition: What's wrong, Commander? Why are you staring at me like that? My body? Yes, some things seem to have gotten bigger... Want to take a look?
skins.login: Commander, did you have a good rest? Me? Umm... I slept very well.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I might have changed, but I'm still the same Furutaka, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ouch! Ah... I just bumped my head again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My hair feels a bit messy... maybe Kako can teach me how to tie it up.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander~! Want to take a nap together?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Since you like me so much... I suppose it's okay~
